title: CUSTOM DENIM JACKET
description:
Crypto Girl has partnered up with Original Genes to bring you your very own Crypto Girl NFT, custom painted onto a vintage denim jacket.

*Please note, all jackets are Vintage Jackets (used/second-hand) however, all are quality inspected and approved prior to your purchase.

title: CUSTOM WHITE CONVERSE
description:
Custom Converse kicks with your NFT.
Crypto Girl has partnered up with Original Genes to bring you your very own Crypto Girl NFT, custom painted on either a white or black pair of classic high top converse kicks.
*All shoes are purchased after the order is made. Crypto girl is not a retailer or seller of Converse shoes nor does it claim to be.

title: LARGE CANVAS
description:
Enjoy your Crypto Girl Collectables NFT as a Canvas print. These prints look incredible in any size. Quality prints are suitable for hanging in any room.
Archival pigment ink-jet print on 200gsm Fine Art Smooth Paper.
